# Householder transform benchmark

## Notation

- tr: Triton
- to: Torch
- toc: Torch Compile

## H100

### Speed

```
householder-speed-fwd-batch4-dim2048-bf16:
         n        tr        to       toc
0   1024.0  0.064004  0.292178  0.084845
1   2048.0  0.064439  0.534654  0.096300
2   4096.0  0.073084  1.025852  0.112917
3   8192.0  0.138207  1.981342  0.180965
4  16384.0  0.267691  3.896378  0.350643
5  32768.0  0.526169  7.717445  0.690554

householder-speed-bwd-batch4-dim2048-bf16:
         n        tr         to       toc
0   1024.0  0.164233   0.698048  0.212276
1   2048.0  0.171767   1.297313  0.245307
2   4096.0  0.252490   2.490218  0.255397
3   8192.0  0.489658   4.862694  0.491969
4  16384.0  0.964170   9.609694  0.964908
5  32768.0  1.917554  19.107763  1.925403
```
